message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $14,000. I think it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value and I'm willing to make a serious offer on it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I can't go lower than $13,500. It's a steal at this price.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit higher on the price. I'd be willing to meet you in the middle at $13,000. That's my final offer.
